long_description: The Wilderness Trail Bikes Nano 29er Comp tire is made for cross-country racing and general riding on moist to dry, hardpacked trails. This classic racer has a round profile, micro-knob design and a large supportive casing to conquer rough race courses and roll with the punches on long trail rides. Elevated centerline tread rolls quickly on asphalt and hardpack, while the numerous working edges track predictably in "dust over crust" conditions. DNA rubber compound offers the ideal mix of rolling efficiency and traction for cross country and trail riding. Supple, yet supportive casing absorbs shocks well and resists cuts and tears; steel bead. WTB Nano 29er Comp tire is a popular choice for short track cross-country races, dirt jumping and urban sessions.
short_description: The Wilderness Trail Bikes Nano 29er Comp tire is made for cross-country racing and general riding on moist to dry, hardpacked trails.
